mapper.insert: insert into user (username, userAge, userSex, userPhone, scan.user.flag, xuhao) values (#{username}, #{userAge}, #{userSex}, #{userPhone}, #{flag}, #{xuhao})
mapper.select: select * from user where flag = 0 order by xuhao
select * from user where xuhao != 0 order by xuhao desc limit 0,1
select * from user where flag = 0 order by xuhao limit 0,1
